taskbody.context:
This task will teach you how to locate, open, and employ Adobe Photoshop. This classroom, as well as many others, have the luxury of Adobe Suite Access, and you are welcome to use this feature while you are using the classroom.
We understand that your students will be making a timeline within the application, so we wanted to provide you with some resources to accommodate that.
PHOTOSHOP TIP LINKS:
Opening the Application:

step.cmd: Press the small magnifying glass icon directly next to the date and time at the top of the screen in the right hand corner
Type in the word "photoshop" to the translucent search bar that appears
Press enter, and the application will open automatically
